pages.text: The Ritual of Siphon (Fluid Pump) is a powerful fluid extraction ritual that automatically pumps fluid source blocks from below the Master Ritual Stone and places them into a tank above. This ritual is the inverse of Relentless Tides, perfect for draining lakes, oceans, or lava pools.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: The ritual requires a fluid tank (any block with fluid storage capability) placed directly above the Master Ritual Stone. Every 0.5 seconds, the ritual attempts to:$(br)1. Find a fluid source block below the ritual stone$(br)2. Extract the fluid from the world$(br)3. Fill the tank with 1 bucket (1000mB) of fluid$(br)4. Consume LP for the operation

pages.title: Search Algorithm
pages.text: The ritual uses an optimized perimeter-based search to find fluid sources:$(br)- Searches in expanding square rings below the MRS$(br)- Also searches vertically downward in each column$(br)- Depth and radius are separately configurable$(br)- Resumes where it left off on subsequent ticks$(br)- Only extracts source blocks, not flowing fluids$(br)- Processes up to 64 positions per tick for performance$(br2)This ensures efficient fluid extraction without lag.

pages.title: No Fluid or Tank Full
pages.text: If the ritual cannot extract fluid (no fluid, tank full, or conflicting fluid type):$(br)- Smoke particles will emit from the MRS as a warning$(br)- No fluid is removed from the world$(br)- No LP is consumed$(br2)The smoke indicates:$(br)• No tank present above the MRS$(br)• Tank is full$(br)• Tank doesn't accept this fluid type$(br)• No fluid sources found in range

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The Ritual of Siphon can be configured via the server config:$(br)- Horizontal Radius: Search radius in blocks (default: 32, range: 1-64)$(br)- Vertical Depth: Maximum depth to search (default: 128, range: 1-256)$(br)- LP Per Extraction: LP cost per fluid extracted (default: 50, range: 1-1000)$(br2)Activation Cost: 5000 LP$(br2)Refresh Time: 0.5 seconds (10 ticks)

pages.title: Ritual Structure
pages.text: The Ritual of Siphon uses the same pattern as Relentless Tides with 8 Water runes (representing fluid control) and 4 Air runes (representing suction and upward flow). The pattern creates three concentric rings of power.

pages.title: Usage Tips
pages.text: This ritual is excellent for:$(br)- Draining large bodies of water or lava$(br)- Clearing flooded areas$(br)- Automated resource collection$(br)- Ocean/lake removal for building$(br2)Works with any fluid tank: Blood Magic tanks, Tinkers' tanks, or modded fluid storage. At default settings, costs 50 LP per bucket extracted.$(br2)Pro tip: Pair with Relentless Tides to move fluids from one location to another! Place Siphon to drain, Relentless Tides to fill.
